Name: Trackmaster
About the game: Challenge your friends to a chaotic race on randomly generated levels. Never play the same track twice! Master tricky obstacles, find shortcuts and use an arsenal of different powerups. Experience a dynamic environment with moving blocks, water physics and changing weather. Features Procedurally generated tracks . All tracks are randomly generated. Choose your difficulty level and track length. Never play the same track twice! Master tricky obstacles . Trackmaster includes more than forty different track parts and more are being added post-release. Learn how to drive in loops, stairs and rotating barrels. Be aware of your surroundings . This is no ordinary racing game. Finding the best route is just as important as driving skills. A smart shortcut may win you the game! Multiplayer . Compete against your friends in chaotic races! Make use of an arsenal of different powerups or simply push your opponent off the road. Choose between four different cars . Paint your car, equip a hat, and choose an annoying horn. Beware that each car has different weaknesses and disadvantages! Dynamic environment . Dynamic weather and water simulation. Race during the night or be washed away by a wave during a storm!
